description: The space branch of the Federation Forces, established in U.C. 0059 in response to Side 3`s declaration of independence. The Federation Space Force is headquartered at Luna II, and after the One Year War it also maintains outposts at many space colonies and at asteroid bases such as Konpeitoh. The EFSF fleet is primarily made up of Salamis-class space cruisers, upgraded versions of which remain in service even after the introduction of newer models.
name: Earth Federation Space Force
